usefulItems: tall glasses, fine mesh sieve, jug
title: Blueberry Mojito

preparations.content: Place 250 g blueberries, sugar and lime juice in mixing bowl then blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then mix <b>10 sec/speed 3<b>. Strain through a fine mesh sieve into a jug then set aside.
Divide remaining 100 g blueberries, ice cubes and lemonade between 6 tall glasses and add reserved blueberry mixture. Garnish with sprigs of mint and slices of lime then serve.
